class RougeScore[source]

RougeScore(tokenizer, argmax:bool=True, agg:str='mid', measure:str='fmeasure', scores:List[str]=['rouge1', 'rouge2', 'rougeL', 'rougeLsum']) :: Callback

Computes ROUGE score using HF datasets metric. Adds ValueMetric for each score iin scores
